entry.title: July user meeting
entry.summary:
Next user meeting will be held on July 31th, 7-9pm at hackerspace.sg.

Talks:

  1. New stuff in IPython notebook: d3-based visualisation and interactive widgets by Ivan.
  2. Data mining, NLP and graph analysis with pattern by Rahul.

entry.title: February user meeting
entry.summary:
Next user meeting will be held on February 19th, 7:30-9pm at the hackerspace.sg.

We'll have Martijn Faassen presenting on MorePath micro web framework.

"Morepath is an Python WSGI microframework. It uses routing, but the routing is to models. Morepath is model-driven and flexible, which makes it expressive." (docs)

entry.title: December user meeting
entry.summary:
Next user meeting will be held on December 18th, 7-9pm at the new hackerspace.sg.

On the menu:

  1. DevOps with Python (ansible) by Rahul
  2. Building interactive web based data visualizations on large datasets without writing any javascript! (bokeh) by Hugo

Videos (thanks to Mike)

  1. Rahul's talk
  2. Hugo's talk
